description:
In an effort to give Nephy power she has some control over, Zagan takes her on as an apprentice. However, after a meeting with the 12 remaining Archdemons, he begins to doubt whether he can give her a normal life.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Il vaut mieux refuser les sollicitations d’un Archidémon
Kiedy arcydemon składa ci propozycję, lepiej odmówić
Maou kara no Kanyuu toka Roku na Koto ni Naranai kara, Kotowatta Hou ga Ii
When an Archdemon Offers You Anything, You`re Better Off Saying No
魔王からの勧誘とかロクなことにならないから, 断った方がいい
